mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM MEMBER WHERE TRUNC(ENROLL_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_TEL, ('(' || M.POST_CODE || ') ' || M.LOAD_ADDRESS || ' ' || M.DETAIL_ADDRESS) AS ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(TRUNC(M.ENROLL_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE, M.SECESSIONFL,
-- 게시글 수 NVL((SELECT COUNT(B.BOARD_NO) FROM BOARD B WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO), 0) AS BOARD_COUNT,
-- 댓글 수 NVL((SELECT COUNT(C.COMMENT_NO) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO), 0) AS COMMENT_COUNT
FROM MEMBER M ORDER BY M.MEMBER_NO

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CREATE_DATE, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_STOCK FROM GOODS LEFT JOIN BOARD USING(BOARD_NO)
ORDER BY BOARD_CREATE_DATE DESC
ORDER BY GOODS_PRICE
ORDER BY BOARD_TITLE
